arts.ttl: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer set for Manchester United reunion at Besiktas – Coaching target flying to Istanbul today
arts.sum: Manchester United match analyst Tom Green is set to leave the club to link up with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer at Besiktas. That’s according to journalist Sercan Dikme, who reports that Green is travelling to Istanbul today to complete his move to the Turkish club. Solskjaer was confirmed as the new Besiktas manager on January 18th The post Ole Gunnar Solskjaer set for Manchester United reunion at Besiktas – Coaching target flying to Istanbul today appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Ridvan Yilmaz transfer out of Rangers details revealed as Ibrox giants say NO to Besiktas
arts.sum: Philippe Clement made clear he is key to his plans and Ibrox chiefs rejected the offer from Turkey

arts.ttl: Official | Al-Musrati joins Monaco on loan from Besiktas
arts.sum: AS Monaco have been in the market for a midfielder throughout the window and have finally got their man on deadline day. Al-Musrati (28) has joined the Principality club from…
